mapper.update: UPDATE t_kw_kw10000 SET on_prgr = '1' WHERE 1 = 1 AND item_code = #{item_code}
mapper.select: SELECT item_code , hash FROM t_etf_tr10001 WHERE 1 = 1 AND item_code = #{item_code}

SELECT kw10000.item_code , prtt.trdd , prtt.trdd_no FROM t_etf_kw10000 kw10000 LEFT OUTER JOIN v_etf_tr40005_prtt prtt ON 1 = 1 AND kw10000.item_code = prtt.item_code AND prtt.rnk = #{rnk} WHERE 1 = 1 AND kw10000.etf_stts NOT LIKE '%정지%'
SELECT item_code , hash FROM t_etf_tr40005 WHERE 1 = 1 AND trdd = #{trdd} AND item_code = #{item_code}
